subject: Apologies in order?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hi All;

I think I over reacted when I thought maybe Bill Murphy, or Rosemary Guiley 
were using the boxes inappropriately. For that I apologize.


What Rosemary was doing by "imprinting" the boxes was not in itself not 
incorrect, and may actually help the communcations, after all she has 
written several books, and is much more knowledgeable than I on things 
paranormal.  Bill seems to be an honest researcher, and he is a likeable guy 
in person.

I apologize to everyone for becoming maybe too sensitive to others ideas 
about how the boxes should be used.

Frank-S
